title: Star Wars Entity Facts Output
description: Output schema for sw_entity_facts_v1 interrogation. Extracts normalized facts about Star Wars entities from evidence.

entity_id.description: The unique identifier for the entity

entity_name.description: The canonical name of the entity extracted from evidence

facts.description: List of extracted facts about the entity

fact_key.description: Identifier for the type of fact (e.g., 'birth_year', 'homeworld', 'species')

value.description: The extracted value. Use null if not found in evidence.

unit.description: Unit for numeric values (e.g., 'BBY' for years, 'meters' for height)

evidence_ids.description: List of evidence snippet IDs that support this fact

notes.description: Optional notes about the extraction or uncertainty

extraction_notes.description: General notes about the extraction process

missing_info.description: List of expected facts not found in evidence
